mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 19 1862. By Telegraph from Pt. Pleasant 19 1862. Capt Young's Company is here he desires to go into the thirteenth 13th if it can be so arranged I think it will be best J.A.J. Lightburn Col Comdg 24M51pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
